mapper.insert: insert into orders (user_id, status, order_date, total_price) values (#{user_id}, #{status}, #{order_date},#{total_price})
mapper.update: update orders set total_price = #{total_price} where order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.select: select order_id from orders where user_id = #{user_id} order by order_date desc Limit 1
